channel.title: Adding Quest Problems
channel.description:
So I added the names of the quest to the list but when I downloaded "xrunes" quests. For example, I copied Romeo's script and changed it to Redbeardfrank. I then replaced everything with "RomeoJuliet" to "PiratesTreasure". I than added Red Beard Frank into the NpcHandler exactly how I named Redbeardfrank. Than I compile it, and it gives me an error about "owner.setPiratesTreasure" and I don't know where to go from there. I deleted everything so when I get help I can just start out fresh. Here is a picture of what I added to the list.
[img]http://s24.postimg.org/o3kzgwevp/screenshot0.png[/img]

item.title: Adding Quest Problems
item.dc:creator: @ALLSTAR-PK ALLSTAR-PK
item.description:
@ALLSTAR-PK wrote:

So I added the names of the quest to the list but when I downloaded “xrunes” quests. For example, I copied Romeo’s script and changed it to Redbeardfrank. I then replaced everything with “RomeoJuliet” to “PiratesTreasure”. I than added Red Beard Frank into the NpcHandler exactly how I named Redbeardfrank. Than I compile it, and it gives me an error about “owner.setPiratesTreasure” and I don’t know where to go from there. I deleted everything so when I get help I can just start out fresh. Here is a picture of what I added to the list.
